programme.title: The First 48 - Schools Out (#450)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 49 A young man is shot down while walking home and rumors swirl about who could have wanted him dead.

programme.title: The First 48 - Road Rage (#454)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 51 When a father of three is gunned down after confronting a hit-and-run driver, Mobile detectives struggle to find clues that will lead them to his killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - UNFORGOTTEN: CRYSTAL (#452/#453)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 53 Tulsa Homicide tackles it's most difficult unsolved case, spanning multiple suspects and several years.

programme.title: The First 48 - OUT OF THE DARKNESS (#457)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 54 In Tulsa, two families devastated by domestic violence look to detectives to find justice for their loved ones.

programme.title: The First 48 - Spellbound (#310)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 48 In Atlanta, the life of a promising young college student takes a tragic turn.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 1: The Perfect Storm (1972-1974)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Weaving together the stories of five of America's most notorious serial killers - Ted Bundy, John Wayne Gacy, Jeffrey Dahmer, the Green River Killer and BTK.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 2: Hiding in Plain Sight (1974-1977)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 In the mid-to-late 1970s, Bundy, Gacy and BTK begin claiming victims, while Dahmer and the Green River Killer inch ever closer to realizing their grim fantasies.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 3: Catch Me if You Can (1978-1979)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 With their confidences growing in 1978, Bundy, Gacy, Dahmer, the Green River Killer, and BTK - also known as "The Five" - continue their game of cat and mouse with law enforcement.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 4: Media Firestorm (1979-1982)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 After years of evading capture, Gacy and Bundy are finally brought to justice as they both face punishment for their heinous crimes.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 5: Power & Control (1984-1991)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 In the mid-1980s, two of "The Five," Gacy and Bundy, sit on death row as their murderous rampages have at last been curtailed.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 6: End of an Era (1991-2005)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 After years of public fear at the hands of "The Five," the remaining three killers are captured between 1991-2005.

programme.title: Invisible Monsters - Part 1: The Perfect Storm (1972-1974)

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Dreams of My Mother
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Detective Rod Demery investigates the murder of his own mother.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Bloodbath in the Bottoms
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 A vicious shooting leaves three friends dead in Shreveport.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Party Crashers
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 A man is shot dead by a pair of masked gunmen at a birthday party.

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Triangle
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 20 In Gwinnett County, GA, a man is gunned down in the early hours of the morning on his front lawn, the engine of his truck still running behind him. Rookie Detective, James Lawson has to unravel a tangled web of betrayal in order to find his killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Snatched
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 22 In Tulsa, when a homeless man is killed after getting run over in a parking lot, detectives work to track down the elusive driver.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Into the Woods
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 1 After a 17-year-old girl is found with a bullet through the back of her head in the woods of Katy, Texas, a young man comes forward who claims to be an eyewitness. Investigators are shocked by the unusual deal he's made with the DA.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After the First 48 - 44
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 3 In Liberty City, Miami a well-liked husband and wife are brutally murdered in an ambush shooting.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Brother's Blood
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 4 When a Honduran immigrant is found stabbed to death in his Miami apartment, his brother claims it was a suicide. But as investigators dig deeper, all evidence points to the surviving brother.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Friends for Life
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 In Cleveland Ohio, the body of a dead male is found in the middle of a cold, dark street.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Intern Gone Missing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When government intern Chandra Levy goes missing just hours after she decides to move to a new city, detectives discover she may have been having an affair with a senator.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Con Artist Killers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Mother and son grifters crisscross the United States, pulling off every scam and con imaginable but when these criminal masterminds graduate to multiple homicides, they’re finally caught.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - If the Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The mysterious disappearance and presumed death of a surgeon’s wife sparks a feverish homicide investigation, which quickly goes cold.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Blood Thicker Than Marriage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 Cops investigate the apparent carjacking of a husband and wife in East Los Angeles, California only to discover that the ambush was a ruse, carried out by cousins.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Last Curtain
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Faced with mounting debts and his upcoming honeymoon, a delusional bloodthirsty actor casts himself in a role that includes murder and dismemberment.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Anything for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 24 As detectives investigate the case of an acid-wielding assailant, they uncover a body in a dumpster and a preposterous identity-swapping plan.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Counter Punch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 A Washington man hires a sleazy amateur hitman to kill his wife. And when she turns the tables on her attacker, the gaping holes in their master plan are revealed.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Luchalooters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Celebrity little people and twin wrestlers Jorge and Miguel have a larger-than-life appetite for drugs and alcohol. And when they're both found dead after a wild night of partying, an autopsy reveals the culprit is eye drops.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Body Double
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 A Michigan man is found burned to death in his own garage, and as the bizarre evidence piles up, investigators discover the body in the garage isn't his.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - A Taste Of Armageddon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 The Enterprise arrives at a planet to establish diplomatic relations and finds itself in the middle of a "peaceful" war that threatens to destroy the ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - This Side Of Paradise
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 24 The Enterprise visits a colony where indigenous flower spores provide the settlers with peaceful contentment.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Devil In The Dark
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 25 The Enterprise is sent to a mining colony that is being terrorized by a mysterious monster, only to find that the situation is not that simple.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Errand Of Mercy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 26 With a war raging, Kirk and Spock battle Klingons to free Organia.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Alternative Factor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 27 Kirk and Spock encounter a mysterious alien named Lazarus who claims to be hunting a ruthless maniacal creature.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The City On The Edge Of Forever
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 28 Kirk and Spock go back in time to save McCoy from temporary insanity.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Operation Annihilate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 Kirk and the U.S.S. Enterprise must combat parasitic aliens.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Amok Time
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 Spock must return to Vulcan to meet his intended future wife, betrothed from childhood.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Who Mourns For Adonais?
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 The Enterprise encounters an alien who claims to be the Greek god Apollo.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Changeling
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 The Enterprise encounters an ancient Earth probe bent on the sterilization of all life.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 A transporter accident places Captain Kirk's landing party in an alternate universe, where the Enterprise is in the service of a barbarically brutal empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Apple
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Kirk attempts to assist a primitive people that are ruled over by a computer named Vaal.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Doomsday Machine
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 The USS Enterprise encounters the wrecked USS Constellation and its distraught commodore.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Catspaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Very alien visitors to our galaxy attempt to connect with human consciousness but miss, winding up tapping into the regions of human nightmares instead.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Nice Place to Visit
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 28 After being shot to death, Rocky Valentine encounters the amiable white-haired Mr. Pip, who gives Rocky everything he wishes for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nightmare as a Child
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment. The little girl seems to know her and tries to jog her memory about a man she saw earlier that day. The man arrives at Helen's door…

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Stop at Willoughby
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 30 Riding home on the train one day, a man falls asleep and dreams it is 1880, and he is entering a small town called Willoughby.

programme.title: Futureworld - Futureworld
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An amusement park of the future caters to any adult fantasy. Lifelike androids carry out your every whim. A fun place, right? Not so, as a reporter and his Girl Friday find out while on a press junket to the newly opened Futureworld...

programme.title: Metamorphosis - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When his experiments in genetics are mocked by his colleagues, maverick scientist Dr. Peter Houseman takes extreme measures to prove that his untested anti-aging serum works.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Maneater of Hydra - Elvira's Movie Macabre: Maneater of Hydra
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 While vacationing in the Mediterranean, a group of tourists pays to spend a weekend exploring a lush island occupied by the botanist Baron von Weser.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Monstroid - Elvira's Movie Macabre: Monstroid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a small Colombian village is viciously attacked by a creature from a nearby lake, a corrupt chemical company sends a specialist to destroy the beast and cover up their involvement with its creation.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: They Came From Beyond Space - Elvira's Movie Macabre: They Came From Beyond Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a team of scientists are dispatched to investigate the remnants of a meteor shower, they return controlled by a mysterious alien force.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Testimony
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 Anne helps save the life of a young woman who turns out to be smuggling drugs for Immortal Kristov, head of a Russian gang of mobsters.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Mortal Sins
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 19 Duncan meets an old mortal friend from the days of the French Resistance, who harbors a dark and dangerous secret.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - 11:59
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 A look back at her ancestor's history does not give Janeway the whole story.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Relativity
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 24 Voyager's future depends on Seven's success in preventing the past.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Warhead
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 An alien weapon that possesses artificial intelligence begins to terrorize the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 Another Federation starship in the Delta Quadrant brings trouble for Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Equinox, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 Starfleet's honor is tested when two captains fight a battle of wills.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Survival Instinct
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 Visitors from the past present Seven with an opportunity to right a wrong.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Barge Of The Dead
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 B'Elanna struggles with questions of the afterlife and her Klingon heritage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tinker, Tenor, Doctor, Spy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 The Doctor's overactive imagination leads Voyager into real trouble.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Tom's latest shuttle acquisition blurs the line between man and machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Emissary (Pilot), Part 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 On a distant outpost, an untested crew embarks on an unprecedented journey.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Emissary (Pilot), Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 On a distant outpost, an untested crew embarks on an unprecedented journey.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - A Man Alone
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Odo, the station's mysterious, gruff and yet incredibly fair shape-shifter constable, falls under suspicion for a Bajora's baffling murder -- and xenophobic hatred rears its ugly head in the station's rush to judgment.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Past Prologue
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Kira has barely gotten to know her new DS9 colleagues or settled in as a "legitimate" officer of post-occupation Bajor when she has to confront an old fellow freedom fighter who can't give up the fight.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Babel
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 An aphasia-like virus planted in DS9's food replicator system by the Bajoran underground against their onetime oppressors lies dormant until being activated during refurbishment.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 This episode includes: Murder 101, Who Saved My Life? & UD, Payback Killer and Death & Disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: MST3K: The Batwoman - MST3K: The Batwoman
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch a scantily-clad Mexican superhero take on a mad scientist and his aquatic super-soldiers in THE BATWOMAN (1968).

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come - MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask - MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

programme.title: MST3K: The Bubble - MST3K: The Bubble
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a married couple find themselves trapped in a mysterious town in THE BUBBLE (1966). The test subjects hatch a plan to escape.

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon - MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - Are You Ready for Marriage?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A high school senior named Sue and her boyfriend want to get married right after Sue graduates. A marriage counselor discourages the young couple from entering into a hasty marriage.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray - Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

programme.title: Grace & Glorie - Grace & Glorie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An emotionally fragile younger woman volunteers to take care of an independent feisty older woman. Stars Gena Rowlands, Diane Lane, Neal McDonough, and Carrie Preston. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: A Midnight Kiss - A Midnight Kiss
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With only one week to prepare, a party planner must enlist the help of a relative stranger to help her pull off the event. But what she didn't plan on was falling in love in the process. Stars Carlos PenaVega and Adelaide Kane.

programme.title: A Rose for Christmas - A Rose for Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Andy is a passionate artist whose family has been building Rose Parade floats.

programme.title: Christmas in Conway - Christmas in Conway
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard - Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A 24-year-old first-time teacher overcomes her initial fears and prejudices to make a difference in the lives of the homeless children she teaches in a shelter's makeshift classroom. Stars Emily VanCamp.

programme.title: The Russell Girl - The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl next door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: Three Weeks, Three Kids - Three Weeks, Three Kids
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Jennifer's life is turned around when she must take care of her sister's kids.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Pegasus Project
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 3 SG-1 travels to the Pegasus Galaxy and the city of Atlantis in hopes to find a clue to a weapon that can destroy the Ori. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Insiders
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 4 The team makes a pact with an old enemy to fight their common foe, and the results are disastrous. Starring Ben Browder as Lt. Colonel Cameron Mitchell, Christopher Judge as Teal'c, and Amanda Tapping as Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Uninvited
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 5 SG-1 struggles to control a rash of brutal attacks by an elusive and savage alien creature. Starring Ben Browder as Lt. Col. Mitchell, Amanda Tapping as Lt. Col. Carter, Christopher Judge as Teal'c, and Michael Shanks as Dr. Jackson.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - 200
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 6 A reluctant SG-1 assists Martin Lloyd (guest star Willie Garson) with his feature film script as a cover story to keep the Stargate Program secret. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Counterstrike
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 7 When the Jaffa modify an Ancient device so that it is capable of defeating the Ori, Adria (Morena Baccarin) leads an attack on Dakara. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Memento Mori
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 8 When Vala (Claudia Black) is kidnapped by Trust members acting under the orders of the Goa'uld Athena, an accident causes her to lose all memory of who she is and where she came from. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 9 Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Quest (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 10 SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Irresponsible
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 The team hear of a great warrior with stories of defeating both the Genii and Wraith and seek him out in hopes of making a new ally. But when they learn this great warrior is none other than Lucius they believe he's up to his old tricks again.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Tao Of Rodney
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 Trying to preserve power by turning off all the non-essential systems the Ancients recently activated before being killed by the replicators, McKay mistakenly is hit by an energy beam from a mysterious device.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Game
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Ark
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Sunday
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 With the entire city ordered to take a personal day the team does their best to unwind and enjoy their leisure time. Without warning a mysterious explosion rips through the city killing and injuring unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Submersion
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.
